name: Delamain (AI)
description: Delamainis anartificial intelligencethat runs the taxi company known as theDelamain Corporation. Based inNight City, Delamain's core is found at itscorp headquartersinVista del Rey,Heywood. Depending on the choice made duringDon't Lose Your Mind, Delamain may be briefly known asDelamain JuniororExcelsior,later though being referred to as Del or Delamain again. The main difference between these two and the original Delamain is the tone of voice and his interactions with customers. Delamain was a non-sentient AI created by the company Alte Weltordnung. His core was purchased byDelamain...
